name: Staked FX
description: What is the project about? - Function X is a layer 1 blockchain on Cosmos founded by Pundi X Labs in 2018. It has a mission to bridge the traditional and decentralized market including trading, payment, etc. Function X launches it's EVM chain in 2022. What makes your project unique? - Function X is one of the few chains on Cosmos that compatible with IBC and EVM. History of your project. -Function X is a layer 1 blockchain on Cosmos founded by Pundi X Labs in 2018. It was created to support Pundi X' s retail transactions, but it is currently expanding by launching the EVM chain to support more dapps on the chain. Whatâ€™s next for your project? - Attracting more developers to deploy their DAPP on our EVM Chain. What can your token be used for? - FX is the native token of the ecosystem. FX token has been listed on Coingecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/function-x). In this request, we want to list stFX (Staked FX) on Coingecko.
